text: Robert Michael (13 June 1879 – 20 March 1963) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). He is the great grandfather of triple premiership player Mal Michael. Recruited from Sale, he did not perform well in his debut VFL game and returned to Gippsland without playing another match. == Notes == == External links == * *Robert Michael's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1879 births Category:1963 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players Category:Sale Football Club players
title: Robert Michael (footballer)
